meanings.definition: To impress or stamp (a design) on a surface.
meanings.sent1: She was incusing her initials on the metal plate.
meanings.sent2: The artist incused intricate patterns onto the clay vase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried incusing smiley faces on the wet cement.
meanings.sent4: His words incused a lasting impression on her heart.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler's skilled hands incused beauty into the silver pendant.

meanings.definition: The act of impressing or stamping a design on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The incusing of the logo on the leather bag was flawless.
meanings.sent2: The ancient coin displayed intricate incusing around its edges.
meanings.sent3: The incusing process requires precision and attention to detail.
meanings.sent4: The incusing on the medal symbolized achievement and honor.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed tools used for incusing designs on metal.
